summary: A futuristic car carousel app with a full-screen viewport carousel.

existing_features.title: Expand the HeroCarousel component to occupy the full viewport width and height (100vw Ã— 100vh), ensuring it fills the entire screen on a laptop without scrolling. The carousel container, slide wrappers, and any inner content containers should all stretch to fill the full viewport dimensions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Expand carousel to full viewport width and height (full-screen on laptop)
